name: Blood, Fuel, Ammo & Speed
description:
Blood, Fuel, Ammo & Speed is a fast-paced action roguelite FPS that is a love child between modern FPS franchises like Doom Eternal and roguelite games such as Vampire Survivors.

The Red Fuel has driven the world into a state of collapse and devastation; mankind has deformed into demons.

Your weaponry and the art of combat are the only things that you can rely on.



  • Bash through the hazards exploring the dynamic corners of the dystopian world. There is no time to waste, so don't wander off.

  • Massacre the demons while wielding the most suitable weapon for the various encounters that emerge along the way.

  • No need to waste time on reloading and farming ammo. Hyper-focus on the battlefield, replenishing your ammo with the blood of your foes and the trustworthy Injector.



  • Perform stylish techniques, utilizing aggressive movement patterns - bullets are not your only asset.

  • The Demon Diamond and Demon Core - the concentrations of Red Fuel Energy, will empower you to ascend into a powerful being.

  • Paint the gruesome, gray world RED with demon blood!
